title: @Riot: Question about armor pen boots
body: Hey all, just wondering if this thought has ever come across your mind before. Like I understand there is mage pen boots by why not armor pen boots? And I am dissapointed that there is no project Riven :'(

replies.body: Did you watch qt's new video? Lmao.
Yes lol. I think he raised a good point lol
Yes, he also raises the point that it would be broken.

Someone watched Imaqtpie's youtube video.

But seriously, they would be broken as hell, and there are already enough armor pen items that a squishy can quite easily have 0 armor.
Yeah I agree. But then they can buy a steraks gage to survive the burst.
If they did make them it would probably be like 5 armour pen seeing as the armour pen items atm are relatively low and probably wouldn't be worth the 1000 gold
Yeah I guess you are right :)

Dude, there is a plethora of ways to reduce enemy armour. BC shreds like 30%, and Youmuu's, Duskblade, Last Whisper duo, and I'm pretty sure Maw or Scimitar offer some more Armour pen. 

There are enough items that together fit all the roles perfectly. BC for bruisers, Duskblade foir assassins, Last whisper for adcs, and Youmuu's for basically anyone

Yes I am already aware of that. I was just saying it would be extra nice to have. I feel with all the items it still Isn't enough against tanks. For me when I look at the old last whisper I miss it alot because of what you could do with it. Yes I love the new armor pen items loads, but I can't just build armor pen, my builds need to be situational

There already _is_ a lot of Armour Penetration:

- In Items
                         - Black Cleaver offers up to 30% Armour Penetration
                         - Youmuu's Ghostblade offers 20 Armour Penetration
                         - Maw of Malmortius offers 10 Armour Penetration
                         - Duskblade of Draktharr offers 10 Armour Penetration


- In Masteries
 - Precision offers up to 8.4 Armour Penetration
 - Battering Blows offers up to 7% Armour Penetration


- In Runes (Tier 3)
 - Mark of Armour Penetration offers 1.28 Armour Penetration each 
                                 - 9 marks = 11.53 total
 - Quintessence of Armour Penetration offers 2.56 Armour Penetration each
    - 3 Quintessences = 7.68 total

 - (Total of 19.21 Armour Penetration)
____________________________________________________

For Magic Penetration:

- In Items
                           - Liandry's Torment/Haunting Guise offers 15 Magic Penetration
                           - Void Staff offers 35% Magic Penetration
                           - Sorcerer's Shoes offer 15 Magic Penetration

- In Masteries
 - Piercing Thoughts offers up to 7% Magic Penetration
 - Precision offers up to 8.4 Magic Penetration


- In Runes (Tier 3)
 - Mark of Magic Penetration offers 0.87 Magic Penetration each
                                - 9 Marks = 7.83
 - Glyph of Magic Penetration offers 0.63 Magic Penetration each
                                - 9 Glyphs = 5.67
 - Quintessence of Magic Penetration offers 2.01 Magic Penetration each
                                - 3 Quintessences = 6.03

 - (Total of 19.53 Magic Penetration)
